**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 201 1.1 **Archetype** [Gladiator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=251) **Prerequisites** [Play to the Crowd](/Feats.aspx?ID=6335) --- When you successfully Play to the Crowd, add the following to the list of benefits you can choose from:
  • A creature you can see within 30 feet becomes [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76). This effect has the [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), and [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727) traits.
